WHS11 004 nucleus accumbens.Definition: Delineation of nucleus accumbens in Waxholm mouse atlas as seen in T2* and T2W weighted volumes.  In T2W image, appears as a subtle textural difference between caudate putamen. Bounded by septal nucleus, olfactory bulb; caudate putamen and ventral cerebral cortex.  Modified from autosegmentations of Waxholm space generated by Badea.
